[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: compound_interest()] [Seconds Per Year Constant] Uses hardcoded 365 * 24 * 60 * 60 for APR calculation. Can this cause issues in leap years or if protocol needs to account for different time periods? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: repay_liquidity()] [Saturating Sub on Repay] Uses saturating_sub for borrowed_amount reduction. Can over-repayment go undetected, allowing borrowers to lose funds without error? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: redeem_ctokens()] [Available Amount Underflow Risk] Subtracts liquidity_amount from available_amount before MIN_AVAILABLE_AMOUNT check. Can this temporarily underflow in edge cases before assertion? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: borrow_liquidity()] [Available Amount Double Deduction] Deducts borrow_amount_with_fees from available_amount. If fees are already included in borrowed_amount tracking, is there double accounting? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: claim_fees()] [Zero Fee Destruction] Checks if balance::value(&fees) > 0 for staking fees, using destroy_zero if not. Can other fee paths fail to handle zero balances properly? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Struct: Reserve] [Attributed Borrow Value] Contains attributed_borrow_value field marked as unused. Can this zombie field cause issues if future code mistakenly uses it? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: create_reserve()] [Initial State Vulnerability] Initializes with available_amount=0, ctoken_supply=0, borrowed_amount=0. Can the very first operations exploit this pristine state for ratio manipulation? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: deposit_liquidity_and_mint_ctokens()] [Atomic State Update] Updates available_amount and ctoken_supply before limit checks. If limit check fails, is state properly rolled back? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: fulfill_liquidity_request()] [Balance Availability] Splits amount from balances.available_amount. If amount > balance value due to race conditions, can this cause panic? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: calculate_utilization_rate()] [Fee Exclusion from Utilization] Uses total_supply_excluding_fees for calculation. Can unclaimed spread fees create arbitrage opportunities by artificially lowering utilization? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: compound_interest()] [Precision Loss in Long Periods] For very long time_elapsed_s (e.g., weeks without update), does pow calculation maintain sufficient precision or can rounding errors accumulate? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: ctoken_ratio()] [Ratio Stagnation Attack] If no operations occur for long periods but interest compounds, can ctoken_ratio become stale, allowing attackers to deposit/redeem at outdated ratios? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: deposit_liquidity_and_mint_ctokens()] [Flash Loan Deposit Attack] Can an attacker use flash-loaned tokens to inflate their ctoken balance, manipulate operations, then withdraw, all within single transaction? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: borrow_liquidity()] [Recursive Borrow Attack] Can an attacker borrow, use borrowed tokens as collateral in another reserve, then borrow more, creating leverage beyond intended limits? (Critical)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: max_borrow_amount()] [Max Borrow Front-Running] The max borrow calculation doesn't account for pending operations. Can attackers front-run to borrow exactly the max, causing next user's borrow to fail? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: redeem_ctokens()] [Mass Redemption DoS] If many users try to redeem simultaneously, can the MIN_AVAILABLE_AMOUNT check cause later redeemers to fail even with sufficient liquidity? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: update_price()] [Price Update Griefing] Can an attacker repeatedly call update_price with minimal price changes to reset price_last_update_timestamp_s, affecting staleness checks in other operations? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: compound_interest()] [Interest Rate Sandwich Attack] Can an attacker manipulate utilization_rate by large deposit/withdrawal around interest compounding to minimize their interest payments? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: deduct_liquidation_fee()] [Liquidation Fee Front-Running] Can liquidators front-run config updates that change protocol_liquidation_fee or liquidation_bonus to maximize their profits? (Medium)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Function: claim_fees()] [Fee Claim Timing Manipulation] Can protocol operators time fee claims to coincide with favorable price updates, maximizing USD value of claimed fees? (Low)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Functions: deposit_liquidity_and_mint_ctokens() + compound_interest()] [Compound Before Deposit Race] If compound_interest() is called between deposit and minting, can the ctoken_ratio change mid-transaction, giving depositor more or fewer ctokens than expected? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Functions: borrow_liquidity() + update_price()] [Price Update During Borrow] If price updates between borrow limit checks, can the USD limit check pass but actual borrowed value exceed limits? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Functions: redeem_ctokens() + unstake_sui_from_staker()] [Unstake Failure Impact] If unstake_sui_from_staker fails (validator offline), does redeem_ctokens properly handle the failure or can it leave inconsistent state? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Functions: repay_liquidity() + compound_interest()] [Compound During Repay] If interest compounds between calculating settle_amount and repayment, can the ceil(settle_amount) check fail even for legitimate repayments? (High)

[File: volo-vault/local_dependencies/suilend_d/suilend/sources/reserve.move] [Functions: claim_fees() + rebalance_staker()] [Concurrent Fee Claims] Can simultaneous calls to claim_fees() and rebalance_staker() cause double-withdrawal from staker or balance inconsistency? (Medium)
